A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite early low ratings from viewers\, this movie lands big and ranks up there with The Empire Strikes Back in my opinion. Yes\, Star Wars is going in a different direction\, which it seems many fans are resisting\, but this story is a fantastic addition to the saga. I will see it again and again and enjoy both an homage to the past as well as an extremely promising future for this franchise.  Kudos to Disney & Rian Johnson!
